description:
Timothy is an interesting guy. He's unconventional in his thinking and his approach to life. Instead of having dreams of moving to the big city, he actually moved from a big city to a small town for his college years. He has the skills, it seems, to play any sport. The big surprise was that he is on a scholarship for cheer leading!
"It's a good way to meet girls," he said.
He also loves dirt bikes and racing them. His face lit up at the thought of racing again but college has taken over his life while he works toward a degree in exercise therapy.
Timothy has beautiful green eyes accentuated by some very long eyelashes. He also has an amazing butt! It was just waiting to burst out of his pants! Add a thick cock and muscular legs, and this guy has pretty much got it all.
After doing some gymnastics moves out in the park, he was visibly excited through his shorts.
"What's going on down there?"
"I don't know what you mean?" he replied as he shook his cock around in his shorts.
"How big is it when it's soft?"
"I don't know..."
"Have you ever been told it's big?"
"A few times," he replied with a huge smile...
title: Timothy
